com.percyvega.motionpoint.crm

Class WebsiteImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.percyvega.motionpoint.crm.WebsiteImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Website

    public class WebsiteImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Website
    WebsiteImpl encapsulates the implementation of the website of a MotionPoint corporate customer.
    Since:
    2015-04-20
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Percy Vega
